name: Starpath (Manojo)
description:
You have lost your place in the heavens and have fallen down to earth. Embrace the journey down the mountain before finding a way to ascend back to the stars.

Collect star fragments to charge your scarf so you can fly higher. Use your energy wisely!

Developed in 48 hours for Global Game Jam 2021. We wanted to tell a story trough a simple concept.

Controls: Left click or tap to jump/fly

Credits:
Norbert Staskevicius
Mason Baxter
John Kim
